product_desc:
Telnexus ERP is a Quote to Cash, Silo-Busting, Digital Delivery Platform for the $115 B Global Telecom Software and Services Industry. We believe the traditional way that telecoms and media conglomerates have integrated business and operational systems is unsustainable and needs reinvention.

Telnexus ERP uses the meta-data-driven enterprise to create a single database to rule them all, and uses the power of true Cloud Computing combined with a robust Service Oriented Architecture to be the backbone for digital service delivery.

Business-to-business sales mangers in telecom dream of the day when they can quote, configure, order, activate and bill multiple types of services  from one single IT system. Telnexus ERP is a native Salesforce application designed to create an end-to-end business process that delivers on that telecom dream yet unrealized.
high_concept: Clould-based Digital Transformation for Telecom and Media
name: Telnexus ERP
